p: Acetylcholinesterase (AChE) type VI-S from Electrophorus electricus (electric eel), EC 3.1.1.7, 245 U/mg solid, 5,5â€²-dithiobis (2-nitrobenzoic acid) (DTNB) and acetylthiocholine iodide (AChI) were all purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA). Ascorbic acid was purchased from Fluka, Buchs, Switzerland.
